Name: Batteries Not Included
Effect: The first time each rest that you use essence crystals for Activate, don't risk essence overload.

Name: Soulwell
Effect: Advantage on skill checks to Essence Tap. Essence Tap restores all of your essence.

Name: Direct Line
Effect: Whenever you lose life due to elemental damage, regain 1 essence. If it was due to one of your charges, regain 2 essence instead.

Name: Glory
Effect: Whenever you land a critical hit, gain 3 essence.
